BackstoryDef.title: vaultborn
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born inside a massive underground vault, the last refuge of a collapsing empire. While other children played, [PAWN_pronoun] studied history, engineering, and survival—preparing for a world [PAWN_pronoun] would never see until it was too late.

BackstoryDef.title: last generation
BackstoryDef.description: The scientists who raised [PAWN_nameDef] never spoke of the world outside, only of duty. [PAWN_pronoun] and a handful others were meant to inherit their knowledge and lead humanity’s return. \nBut before the lessons were complete, the labs fell silent. And then the lights went out.

BackstoryDef.title: private colony
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] family was part of a privately owned colony, a paradise world built by the wealthy. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in pristine parks and clean streets, shielded from the troubles of the wider world. \n[PAWN_nameDef] thought it would last forever.

BackstoryDef.title: cloud walker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew between sky platforms harvesting atmospheric water vapor. Underfoot, perpetual fusion reactors hummed the city's lullaby.

BackstoryDef.title: hydronaut
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up beneath the waves, in a pressurized dome clinging to the ocean floor. Bioluminescent gardens and abyssal currents were [PAWN_possessive] childhood playground.

BackstoryDef.title: metropolitan
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on this very planet. Well, to say ‘this’ wouldn’t be entirely true. In those days, it was a marvel of interstellar trade, a border world teeming with life, industry, and culture. \nWhile it was nothing compared to the true centers of power, it still could compare to some of the quieter, more utilitarian coreworlds. The cities stretched towards the sky, and the economy ran so smoothly that scarcity was little more than a concept from history lessons.

BackstoryDef.title: rimworld
BackstoryDef.description: For [PAWN_nameDef], childhood was a time of effortless luxury. The world of [PAWN_possessive] birth was a playground of indulgence, where boredom, not hardship, was the greatest enemy. Without the need for labor or struggle, children like [PAWN_nameDef] spent their days immersed in art, philosophy, and whatever fleeting obsessions caught their interest. \n[PAWN_pronoun] still remembers the name it once had, [PAWN_possessive] world—the real name, the one spoken with reverence. Not like that still matters. To the galaxy, it is just another ‘rimworld’.

BackstoryDef.title: glassborn
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a biodome, in one of the least habitable places on the planet. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised among artificial forests and sterile air, safe from the poisoned wasteland beyond.

BackstoryDef.title: clanfolk
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to rely on skill, discipline, and strength. The traditions of the family were older than the technologies that surrounded them, and those traditions demanded hardship. \nWhile others grew up in sterile, automated environments, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to track, hunt, and fight. Training was relentless, both in body and mind. The beasts of the land were not just tools, but partners, raised and respected as extensions of the self.

BackstoryDef.title: sleeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was nobody special. When the world burned, [PAWN_pronoun] ran—only to find [PAWN_objective]self in a facility offering ‘safe’ passage into the future. [PAWN_pronoun] took the deal. Now, centuries later, [PAWN_pronoun] woke up to a world even more hostile than the one [PAWN_pronoun] left.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient technician
BackstoryDef.description: Before the world collapsed, [PAWN_nameDef] maintained machines more advanced than anything the rimworlders have ever seen. Power grids, automated factories, cybernetics—[PAWN_pronoun] understood it all. \nBut when the systems failed, even [PAWN_possessive] knowledge couldn’t stop the end.

BackstoryDef.title: routine technician
BackstoryDef.description: Every system needed oversight. Every vault required maintenance. It wasn’t exciting work, but it was essential. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days performing routine checkups, running diagnostics, and ensuring everything remained in working order. \nInter-vault communication was part of the job—verifying reports, exchanging updates, confirming that all was as it should be. It was a quiet, structured existence.

BackstoryDef.title: last diplomat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a diplomat, an ambassador between warring city-states. [PAWN_pronoun] negotiated peace, made fragile alliances, and tried to keep the old world from burning. It burned anyway. \nNow, all that remains of your people’s history is what you carry in your mind.

BackstoryDef.title: eternal rival
BackstoryDef.description: Before the fall, [PAWN_nameDef] had an enemy. [PAWN_pronoun] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to hunting them, tracking them across the stars. Then, everything collapsed, and [PAWN_pronoun] was put on ice. \nNow, [PAWN_pronoun] is awake—and his old enemy might still be out there.

BackstoryDef.title: crypto insurgent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a rebel cell that used cryptosleep caskets to skip decades between operations, waiting to strike at the empire's weak points. \nWhen [PAWN_pronoun] finally emerged for [PAWN_possessive] last mission, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] entire network obliterated by shifting politics and forgotten wars. The years in stasis left [PAWN_pronoun] with sharpened combat instincts and technical knowledge, but no cause to fight for.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient general
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was privileged enough to know what most never did—the war was not going as planned. The enemy’s psychic forces were beyond anything conventional strategy could counter. Every battle saw soldiers reduced to screaming husks, fleets torn apart by unseen forces. \n[PAWN_pronoun] was among the most fervent advocates of the Super Soldier Initiative—a long-stalled enhancement program that had failed to produce stable results. Some subjects lost vision, others could no longer walk. Many simply died. But with the war nearing total collapse, refinement was no longer an option. \nTo demonstrate full commitment, [PAWN_pronoun] placed [PAWN_possessive]self among the first to receive the enhancements.

BackstoryDef.title: sleeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] first cryptosleep casket was in a facility full of the dead. When [PAWN_pronoun] woke, the lights flickered, the security systems hummed to life, and something moved in the darkness. \n[PAWN_nameDef] doesn't know if [PAWN_pronoun] was meant to wake up or if someone let [PAWN_objective] out.

BackstoryDef.title: perimeter guard
BackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] was part of a unit tasked with patrolling the wasteland between vaults, back when there was still hope of restoring supply lines—something more reliable than slingshot relays. 
But the wasteland was not empty. The patrols vanished one by one—some found torn apart, others simply gone. The vaults sealed their doors, the records were scrubbed, and the project was quietly abandoned. 
[PAWN_pronoun] saw things out there—things that should not have been. When the others asked, [PAWN_pronoun] stayed silent. Some believed [PAWN_pronoun] didn't trust them. Others thought [PAWN_pronoun] was under orders not to speak. 
They were wrong. [PAWN_pronoun] kept silent out of mercy.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient scientist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on the last great projects of [PAWN_possessive] age—terraforming, medicine, weapons of war. The future was within reach, but history had other plans. When the world collapsed, so did [PAWN_possessive] lab. \n[PAWN_pronoun] sealed [PAWN_objective]self in stasis, trusting that someone, someday, would wake [PAWN_objective] to finish [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: assassin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an elite killer in a secret program. When [PAWN_possessive] targets vanished into cryosleep, [PAWN_possessive] handlers decided to store [PAWN_objective] alongside them. \nNow, they’re gone, but [PAWN_pronoun] is still here.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient soldier
BackstoryDef.description: When the war turned hopeless, [PAWN_nameDef]'s commanders gave [PAWN_objective] a final order: sleep until the war could be won. \nBut centuries later, the war is long over, and your side lost.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained for war. [PAWN_pronoun] remembers endless drills, injections, surgeries. [PAWN_pronoun] remember battles that lasted minutes, victories that were meaningless. \nAnd then the war ended, lefting [PAWN_objective] in a stasis pod, waiting for a new purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: vault security
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had been trained for warfare, but when the retreat into the vaults came, [PAWN_pronoun] was selected for security duty instead. Not just for [PAWN_possessive] skill with a weapon, but for [PAWN_possessive] discipline, temperament, and ability to enforce order without question. \nVault security required restraint as much as force. It was about keeping the peace, managing conflicts, and ensuring that when the time came, people followed orders.

BackstoryDef.title: clan soldier
BackstoryDef.description: Even in an age of post-scarcity technology, there were still those who lived by the old ways. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father came from one of the few remaining clan families who still practiced the ancient warrior traditions—honing the body, mastering close combat, and living in harmony with the beasts they raised and hunted. \nWhen [PAWN_nameDef] was conscripted, even the army made an exception for [PAWN_possessive] discipline, allowing [PAWN_pronoun] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] clan’s ways rather than standard training.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier fighting in the last great war. When the final battle was lost, [PAWN_possessive] superiors decided [PAWN_pronoun] was more useful as a contingency plan than as a corpse.

BackstoryDef.title: trapped elite
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived among the elite, one of the few who ruled from pristine sanctuaries while the rest of society toiled below. When collapse loomed, [PAWN_pronoun] tried retreating to one of [PAWN_possessive] many holdings across the stars. \nBut the blockade came too soon. The ships never launched. With no other choice, [PAWN_nameDef] sought refuge in the vaults—trapped like everyone else.

BackstoryDef.title: repurposed caretaker
BackstoryDef.description: Although it was a subject of heavy debate before mandatory cryosleep, the scarcity of space and resources made natural births increasingly rare within the vault. Traditional childcare roles became obsolete, and specialists were forced to adapt. \n[PAWN_nameDef] had been trained in early childhood development, but as demand for infant care dwindled, [PAWN_pronoun] was repurposed into the medical field. The transition was abrupt, but [PAWN_pronoun] adapted, applying pedagogical principles to patient care. Though now a medic, [PAWN_pronoun] still retains the instincts of an educator.

BackstoryDef.title: structural engineer
BackstoryDef.description: A failing structure could mean the end for everyone. Stability was everything. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in the design, maintenance, and reinforcement of the vault’s architecture, ensuring that every wall, bulkhead, or pressure seal remained intact. \nThe job demanded precision, reinforcement protocols, and emergency repairs. Mistakes were unacceptable. When something failed, [PAWN_pronoun] was the one called to fix it before disaster struck.

BackstoryDef.title: bioengineer
BackstoryDef.description: Food security was a constant concern in the vaults. Traditional agriculture was inefficient, and every resource had to be optimized. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in hydroponics, genetic crop modification, and soil regeneration, ensuring that food production remained stable despite limited space and resources. \n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years refining plant strains for faster growth, higher yields, and resilience to vault conditions. Every harvest was a test of [PAWN_possessive] work, every failure a potential crisis.

BackstoryDef.title: excavation specialist
BackstoryDef.description: The vaults needed more than just space—they needed expansion, resources, and reinforced tunnels that could last for centuries. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in deep excavation, operating precision mining rigs and shaping the underground world to support those who lived within it.

BackstoryDef.title: nutritional systems specialist
BackstoryDef.description: In the vaults, food wasn’t just a necessity—it was a science. With limited space, strict rationing, and synthetic alternatives, every meal had to be carefully planned for efficiency and sustainability. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in vault nutrition, ensuring that meals were not only edible but optimized for long-term health and morale. \nCooking in such conditions required creativity. With fresh ingredients scarce, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to work with vat-grown proteins, hydroponic crops, and processed supplements, turning them into something that resembled real food. In a world of ration bars and nutrient paste, [PAWN_pronoun] made survival taste a little more like living.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient pilot
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] fought in the last great war, not on a planet, but in the cold emptiness of space. \n[PAWN_pronoun] piloted war machines, boarded enemy stations, and watched entire fleets burn. Then the war ended, and [PAWN_possessive] side lost. \nTreated with barely more ceremony than a malfunctioning drone, [PAWN_pronoun] was sealed into a cryopod—a forgotten relic shoved into the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: ancient commander
BackstoryDef.description: Before the fall, [PAWN_nameDef] led soldiers through battle. [PAWN_possessive] war was a desperate last stand. \nWhen the final city fell, [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] officers chose cryosleep over surrender.
